text: I have more to add to that section of the personal statement however it wasnt as hard to write as i expected it to be!:grin: Great to hear, i feel like i should move out and experience new things as it gives you new life skills even though i know i will be overwhelmed and extremly home sick.
Iâ€™m excited and nervous at the same time to start uni and the pros and cons you listed helped a lot so thank you so much!:blush:
